text: Laurent Peyrelade (born 7 July 1970) is a French former footballer who played as a forward, and currently the manager of French club Rodez. ==Managerial career== On 16 May 2015, Peyrelade became the manager of Rodez AF. On 4 April 2019, Peyrelade helped manage Rodez into the Ligue 2 for the first time in 26 years. ==Personal life== Peyrelade's manages his son Alexis Peyrelade, who is a footballer for Rodez. ==References== ==External links== *LFP Profile *FDB Profile *Soccerway Profile *L'Equipe Profile *Legendes du FC Nantes Profile Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Limoges Category:Association football forwards Category:French footballers Category:French football managers Category:CS Sedan Ardennes players Category:Lille OSC players Category:Le Mans FC players Category:FC Nantes players Category:Pau FC players Category:Rodez AF managers Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Ligue 2 managers
title: Laurent Peyrelade
